backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (UserProfile, Post, Comment, Story, Video, Message, Conversation, CharacterProfile) and API methods for CRUD operations on social media entities with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds a videos Map to the actor state, preserving existing data structures for conversations, profiles, posts, comments, stories, and character profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: video content creation with captions, live streaming capability, and messaging functionality fixes, all with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components and pages including video features, live streaming, messaging fixes, scrollable select components, and cache-busted avatar rendering with retry logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, and chart colors in oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and title describing a private cartoon-friends social media app.
frontend/ops/production-deployment-retry: Runbook for retrying production deployment of Draft Version 4 without code changes, including pre-deployment verification steps and deployment initiation instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication flow with Internet Identity, profile setup dialog for new users, and conditional rendering of SignIn or AppShell with theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell with header, bottom navigation for five pages (home, videos, messages, characters, profile), logout functionality, and gradient background styling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarImage.tsx: Renders an avatar image with fallback initials, supporting multiple sizes and cache-busting for avatar updates. Includes retry logic on image load errors.
frontend/src/components/CharacterFormDia: Dialog form for creating or editing characters with name, bio, and avatar upload. Handles multi-step saving with progress tracking for avatar uploads.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays a list of comments for a post with timestamps and allows users to add new comments as themselves or as any character.
frontend/src/components/CreateConversati: Dialog for creating a new conversation by selecting one or more characters to chat with, displaying character profiles with checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Dialog form for creating a story post with image upload, caption, and author selection (user or character). Validates image size and provides preview.
frontend/src/components/LiveStreamCard.t: Card component displaying a live stream with thumbnail, live badge, viewer count, title, and author information. Clickable to open stream details.
frontend/src/components/LiveStreamDialog: Dialog for starting a live stream with title input and author selection. Shows live indicator when streaming starts and auto-closes after confirmation.
frontend/src/components/LiveStreamViewer: A dialog component that displays a simulated live stream with author info, live badge, viewer count, and stream title. Fetches character and user profiles to show stream author details.
frontend/src/components/MessageThread.ts: Displays a conversation thread with messages, auto-scrolling, and a message composer. Allows users to send messages as themselves or as characters, with real-time updates via polling.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a social media post card with author info, content, optional image, like/comment actions, and expandable comments panel. Uses date-fns for relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: A form component for creating posts with text content and optional image upload (max 5MB). Users can post as themselves or as any character.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A modal dialog for first-time user onboarding that prompts for a name and saves the user profile. Cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/ScrollableSelect: A wrapper for Radix Select that adds scroll indicators (up/down chevrons) when content overflows. Uses ResizeObserver and scroll events to manage indicator visibility.
frontend/src/components/StoriesRow.tsx: Displays a horizontal scrollable row of story avatars with a create button. Opens dialogs for creating new stories or viewing existing ones when clicked.
frontend/src/components/StoryViewerDialo: A dialog component that displays a story with author info, timestamp, image, and optional caption in a full-screen Instagram-style viewer.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A card component that renders a video post with author avatar, name, timestamp, optional caption, and an embedded video player.
frontend/src/components/VideoComposer.ts: A form component for creating video posts with file upload, caption input, author selection, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, characters, posts, comments, stories, conversations, and videos with mutations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind configuration, OKLCH color system for light/dark themes with retro/neon palette, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Characters.tsx: Displays a grid of character profiles with create, edit, and delete functionality, using CharacterFormDialog for character management and showing empty state when no characters exist.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Main feed page showing stories, live streams, post composer, and sorted posts with loading skeletons; includes dialogs for starting and viewing live streams.
frontend/src/pages/Messages.tsx: Displays list of conversations with characters, allows creating new chats, and switches to MessageThread view when a conversation is selected.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile settings page with form to edit name, bio, and avatar image with preview and file upload validation (5MB limit).
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Landing page with branding and Internet Identity login button, explaining the app as a private cartoon-themed social space with content ownership reminder.
frontend/src/pages/Videos.tsx: Videos feed page with video composer, sorted video list, and live streaming functionality including start stream dialog and viewer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended border radius, typography, container queries, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a social media app with video posting, live streaming, and messaging features, noting that messaging functionality is currently broken and needs fixing.
